faqs.question: How does the subscription service work?
faqs.answer: Our subscription service delivers curated tech boxes to your doorstep at your chosen frequency (monthly/quarterly/yearly). After selecting your preferred box, we'll ship it with carefully selected gadgets matching your tech interests. You can pause, modify, or cancel anytime.

faqs.question: What's included in each subscription box?
faqs.answer: Each box contains 3-5 premium tech products based on your selected category (Smart Home, Gaming, etc.). You'll receive a mix of devices, accessories, and exclusive digital content. Every box includes product guides and access to our expert support.

faqs.question: Can I customize my subscription box?
faqs.answer: Yes! After signing up, you'll complete a tech preference profile where you can specify device types, brands, and price ranges. Our algorithm personalizes selections while keeping some elements as fun surprises.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees?
faqs.answer: No hidden fees. The price shown includes all products, standard shipping, and taxes. Expedited shipping and international deliveries may incur additional charges clearly shown at checkout.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel anytime from your account dashboard. We don't require lengthy forms or phone calls. Your cancellation will be effective immediately after your current billing period ends.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift subscriptions?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Gift subscriptions are available for 3, 6, or 12-month periods. The recipient can customize their box preferences upon activation. We include personalized gift messaging with digital or physical gift cards.
